NK081(zhu)018:2: rdo rje mi bskyod pa la 'dud //
NK081(zhu)018:4: gzhi po dngos po'i gshis nyid dang //
NK081(zhu)018:5: don du gnyer ba'i lam nyid dang //
NK081(zhu)018:6: smin stobs mngon byas 'bras nyid gsum //
NK081(zhu)018:7: rtsa ba'i lus su shes par bya //
NK081(zhu)018:8: rang sems ma bcos lhun grub las //
NK081(zhu)018:9: 'khrul snang gnyis bsdus brtag gzhir bshad //
NK081(zhu)018:10: lam gyi bye brag rnam bshad pa //
NK081(zhu)018:11: thun mong khyad par de phyi nang //
NK081(zhu)018:12: nyid la thabs dang shes rab lam //
NK081(zhu)018:13: cig car rim pa la yang gnyis //
NK081(zhu)018:14: thod rgal mthar chags dbye ba'i sgo //
NK081(zhu)018:15: rnal 'byor dgu bcu 'am lam lnga ste //
NK081(zhu)018:16: mtshan nyid gsum la zag dang ldog /yod med gnyis su bsdud te bstan //
NK081(zhu)018:17: dang po rgyu shes rnal 'byor dang //
NK081(zhu)018:18: stong sgyu gcig spros tshogs rkyen 'jug /rnam smin dbang sgyur phyag rgya grub //
NK081(zhu)018:20: rtsa ba tshogs sbyor mthong sgom mthar //
NK081(zhu)018:21: lam lngar bsdus te bye sgo brgyad //
NK081(zhu)018:22: rten lus sgrib byang lta ba sems //
NK081(zhu)018:23: bskur thob bdud btul yon tan rdzogs //
NK081(zhu)018:24: lam rten 'byung lus rnam smin lus //
NK081(zhu)018:25: rdo rje'i ye shes lus su grub //
NK081(zhu)018:26: las sgrib nyon mongs kun 'gro dang //
NK081(zhu)018:27: lhan cig gnas dang bag nyal byang //
NK081(zhu)018:28: dbang po'i rang mtshan bar chad med //
NK081(zhu)018:29: dbang bsgyur mi g.yo kun mkhyen chub //
NK081(zhu)018:30: g.yo smin 'jug gnas mthar phyin par //
NK081(zhu)018:31: chos nyid ye shes la sems pa //
NK081(zhu)018:32: phan nus gsang dbang shes rab dbang //
NK081(zhu)018:33: bde chen dbang gi rim bskur nas //
NK081(zhu)018:34: rmi lam sgra brnyan sa khams lung //
NK081(zhu)018:35: zhing khams sangs rgyas nyid du bstan //
NK081(zhu)018:36: lha bdud nyon mongs 'chi bdag dang //
NK081(zhu)018:37: phung po'i bdud kun bcom nas ni //
NK081(zhu)018:38: drod dang rtags dang cho 'phrul dang //
NK081(zhu)018:39: mngon shes ye shes rdzogs par 'byung //
NK081(zhu)018:40: lam pa byang chub sems dpa' ni //
NK081(zhu)018:41: dbang lung bton nas bcom ldan 'das //
NK081(zhu)018:42: 'bras bu thob tshul gnas mkhyen mdzad //
NK081(zhu)018:43: rang snang lhun grub btsal med rdzogs //
NK081(zhu)018:44: bka' rgyud lung rigs bcud bsdus pa //
NK081(zhu)018:45: kun gyis rdo rje 'dzin thob shog //
NK081(zhu)018:46: sgyu 'phrul me long 'od phreng zhes bya ba'i man ngag bi ma las mdzad pa rdzogs so //
